We're just starting here, using Rake / JRuby / Restlet (client and
server) =
for acceptance tests. These tests are not "end user" and so
there is no use=
r interface. Although we've also use FIT running tests
off our Confluence w=
iki for other tests, both automated and clickable
from the wiki.

Nothing f=
ancy yet, so I am interested in the other responses.
Automation is a requir=
ement, and integration with continuous
integration tools. We wrote a simple=
 class for accumulating test
results and writing text and xml result files =
(using the ant/junit
defacto xml format).
